publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3168 Christine Grahame: Sculpture for Women of Suffrage—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive’s decision to commission a sculpture in recognition of the achievements of women of suffrage and other women in Scotland who have contributed to votes for women and the advancement of democracy generally, particularly in this Parliament with some 40% representation of women as MSPs, and considers that this recognition is long overdue and may give inspiration to women elsewhere who still struggle for these rights.

S2M-3168 Sculpture for Women of Suffrage (lodged on 18 August 2005) John Swinburne*, Rosie Kane*, Ms Sandra White*, Alex Neil*, Rob Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Chris Ballance*, Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*, Shiona Baird*, Jim Mather*, Frances Curran*, Eleanor Scott*, Tommy Sheridan*, Dennis Canavan*, Pauline McNeill*, Trish Godman*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-3168 Sculpture for Women of Suffrage (lodged on 18 August 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3168 Sculpture for Women of Suffrage (lodged on 18 August 2005) Helen Eadie*
S2M-3168 Sculpture for Women of Suffrage (lodged on 18 August 2005) Susan Deacon*
S2M-3168 Sculpture for Women of Suffrage (lodged on 18 August 2005) Elaine Smith*
